changelog.change: Added the Settings box to the configuration screen.
Added a description for the Level split type on the help screen.
Added the word "Help" to the help button (previously just a question mark).
Added numbers to the beginning of each split (i.e. split indices).
Added level splits (based on X and Y coordinates).
Updated to save splits automatically when values are changed in the split data combo box.
Fixed cartridge count and tumor count loading.
The timer no longer instantly restarts if you reset while still in-game.
Updated the UI to save splits as splits are modified (rather than having to click Save Splits).
Runs now start on file select rather than at the opening cutscene.
